nodes.text: First Order All Terrain Armored Transport

The First Order All Terrain Armored Transport (AT-AT) was a model of All Terrain Armored Transport walker manufactured by Kuat-Entralla Drive Yards and fielded by the First Order. The design was reminiscent of the AT-AT used by the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. Two First Order AT-ATs were deployed alongside the larger All Terrain MegaCaliber Six during the Battle of Crait. The walker featured increased armor and a boarding ramp under its chin in place of the heavy laser cannons; instead, its primary cannons were mounted on the sides of its head.
